name: Expanded Spell List
description: The Fiend lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you: 1st - Burning Hands, Command; 2nd - Blindness/Deafness, Scorching Ray; 3rd - Fireball, Stinking Cloud; 4th - Fire Shield, Wall of Fire; 5th - Flame Strike, Hallow.
